original_text: So I turned and came down from the mount, and the mount burned with fire: and the two tables of the covenant were in my two hands.
korean_text: 내가 돌이켜 산에서 내려오는데 산에는 불이 붙었고 언약의 두 돌판은 내 두 손에 있었느니라

sentences.original_text: So I turned and came down from the mount
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 내가 돌아서서 그 산에서 내려왔고

sentences.original_text: and the mount burned with fire
and the two tables of the covenant
